original_text: Many people there had bad spirits, which were living in them. Philip sent the bad spirits out of those people. As the spirits came out, they shouted loudly. Some other people had weak arms or legs, and some people could not walk well. Philip caused many of them to become well again.
korean_text: 많은 사람에게 붙었던 더러운 귀신들이 크게 소리를 지르며 나가고 또 많은 중풍병자와 못 걷는 사람이 나으니

sentences.original_text: Many people there had bad spirits
sentences.korean_translation: 거기 많은 사람들에게는 악한 영들이 있었습니다
그 영들은 그들 안에 살고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Philip sent the bad spirits out
Some other people had weak arms or legs
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 어떤 사람들은 팔이나 다리가 약했습니다

sentences.original_text: and some people could not walk well
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 사람들은 잘 걸을 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: Philip caused many of them to become well again
sentences.korean_translation: 빌립은 그들 중 많은 사람들을 다시 건강하게 만들었습니다
